name: FlatOrb Technologies
tag_list: it, technology, consulting, web-designing, engineering, services, software-consulting
overview:
FlatOrb Technologies is a quality provider of Professional Technological Consultations and Services that specializes in providing Engineering, Information Technology (IT), Program Management Support, Software Development, and Training & Logistics to governmental and commercial clients. For years we, FlatOrb, have provided our clients with innovative, productive and economical solutions that meet their challenges and have helped our clients to reach their success.

We are committed to provide value based technological solutions that support our clients mission and/or business.

Our specialties cover: Information Technology (IT), Networking, Software Development, and related Electrical, Electronics, Mechanical, Environmental, and other Engineering aspects Project Management, Optimizations, Solutions

Our projects in the past have ranged from customizing and building a simple home PCâ€™s, to creating web servers, to development of commercial and corporate websites, to software solutions and development, to building large scale machinery with automated control systems and complex systems of sersoring and decision making.

Our experienced and talented personnel and cutting edge technology we utilize, enables us to provide highly reliable and economical solution to any client that seeks our services.

We heavily invest in our employees providing professional and personal growth. Investing in our corporate infrastructure, cutting-edge technologies, and adopting processes and methodologies that increase our productivity and reliability has allowed us to attain beyond our client expectations. At FlatOrb we consider ourselves to be a community with highest level of integrity and ethical conduct. We stimulate ourImagination, promote our Innovation, and always strive for nothing less than the perfectness of implementation.
